Add Nav search bar, Footer policies section, and mock home page

- Add search bar to Nav component with icon and form
- Add Policies section to Footer (Terms, Cookie Policy, Accessibility)
- Move Breadcrumbs to components/layouts folder
- Create comprehensive mock home page with:
  - Hero section with CTA buttons
  - Services/What We Do section with cards
  - Stats section (500+ contractors, 10k+ homes, 15+ years)
  - Call-to-action section
  - Latest news section with article cards
- Update Layout to import Nav, Footer, and Breadcrumbs from layouts folder
- Improve Layout structure with flexbox for sticky footer
